comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Weißenthurm is a municipality in the district of Mayen-Koblenz, in Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. It is situated on the left bank of the Rhine, opposite Neuwied, approx. 12 km north-west of Koblenz. Weißenthurm is the seat of the Verbandsgemeinde ("collective municipality") Weißenthurm. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weissenthurm
